website_summaries.verdict: It might look the part of a $500 machine, but the KitchenAid Pro Line didn't toast any better than the $30 Hamilton Beach Classic Chrome Toaster.
pros: The KitchenAid Pro Line looks great and automatically reheats your toast when you forget about it

customer_reviews.title: I give up
customer_reviews.text: We've had this toaster for nearly 10 months now. I would not buy it again. It takes forever. The heating element is so weak that we have to set the timer on maximum and then add additional time when the cycle is complete. Clearly not carefree operation. Many types of bread dry out before they brown. Way too much money for an appliance that performs so poorly.
customer_reviews.author: RiboNovix

customer_reviews.title: This KitchenAid Toaster is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This KitchenAid Toaster is amazing !! The toaster takes care of everything and the toast comes up just the way you desire it. I love it and I would not hesitate to recommend it !!
customer_reviews.author: Thelma I. Kobalka

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Toaster
customer_reviews.text: So I’m not sure if I just skipped over the part where this is motorized, but I was very surprised when it ate my bread. The toaster works great. I’ve had it for almost a year now and we use it daily. The crumb tray is easy to clean. It toasts very evenly. I love it keeping it warm if I can’t get back to it in time. I would buy this again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Trey chapman

customer_reviews.title: Toasting is slower than the Breville Toaster I had and loved. Love the color and style
customer_reviews.text: The four bread compartments are much smaller than I anticipated. We often toast sour dough bread and have to cut the pieces in half to toast them. Even breads such as Oroweat Rye Bread is slightly too large to fit in it. Toasting is slower than the Breville Toaster I had and loved. Love the color and style.
customer_reviews.author: Dynva B. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful appliance but doesn’t toast even, weak heating elements, and broke in under 2 years. A pretty decoration only. I have had lots of kitchen aid appliances over the years but worried the company has gone down.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Cefalu

customer_reviews.title: Ferrari of Toasters!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and feature packed (motorized lowering, keep warm feature) ultimate toaster. Expensive but hey- what the heck!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Sez Hi

customer_reviews.title: one side works the other is aweful
customer_reviews.text: Lets just say I feel like I was stolen from with the cost of this toaster that my husband had to have for looks. The left side works flawlessly the right side wont pop up or it works then when you remove your toast it goes down EMPTY to cook again. One thing I hate is if you do not pull your toast out immediately it will automatically put it down again.
customer_reviews.author: chris m

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Toaster, love it!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t think we needed a toaster like this (for that price) but my husband convinced me and now we all love it. Use it every day and enjoy the convenience of having 4 slices toasted at once.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Kostersitz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of equipment. It chimes when it is finished and if you can't get right to it the toaster will keep it warm for a short time. It does take up a LOT of space, but it IS beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: good toaster with some great features
customer_reviews.text: wide slots, easy clean, smooth up and down, more heat
customer_reviews.author: Gray solar

customer_reviews.title: Cool Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Cool Toaster. Its fun to see the flashing lights and hear the chimes when your toast is ready but its just a toaster. Its not faster than any other toaster nor does it toast exceptionally evenly. Cool Toaster!
customer_reviews.author: TK in SA

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: We’re about four months in and like it. Other reviews reflected some issues but we haven’t experienced any to date....hopefully things stay that way. Cool looking and good functioning toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: FANCY BUT I GOT CARRIED AWAY AND PURCHASED IT. NOT NECESSARY.
customer_reviews.text: IT IS A FACINATING PIECE OF EQUIPMENT. I SPENT WAY TOO MUCH FOR IT. I CAN'T DECIDE WHETHER TO PUT MY PREVIOUS ONE BACK IN SERVICE AND GIVING THIS ONE AWAY OR WHAT.
customer_reviews.author: golfer

customer_reviews.title: we love it perfect for the running mornings
customer_reviews.text: Super nice works just like advertised we love it perfect for the running mornings
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Love the Kitchen Aid 4 slice toaster.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very attractive and has all of the features you would ever want in a toaster. The only thing it doesn't do is bake the bread!
customer_reviews.author: John Quartermain

customer_reviews.title: My best toaster ever!
customer_reviews.text: My best toaster ever! Toast is perfectly browned. My last toaster was a Dualit which I purchased in the UK in 1999 (still works but UK voltage required, so it is in storage at the moment). Loved the Dualit, but after reading reviews on both, I decided to buy the KitchenAid. I am very happy with that decision. It is an awesome toaster, looks great, and more functionality than the Dualit. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Dr A.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but the quality and function is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully. We love that it will drop your toast back down and into warm mode if you don’t remove it. It’s great when making big meals.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher pitts

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Aide Toaster
customer_reviews.text: It’s the most awesome toaster I’ve ever seen. We love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Roland

customer_reviews.title: Ver nice! Perfect toast nuances
customer_reviews.text: The Cadillac of toasters! Ver nice! Perfect toast nuances! Great automation features! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: greatest toaster
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look of this toaster but the way it works is super. toast comes out great but lets you warm in case you are not quite ready!
customer_reviews.author: lkh

customer_reviews.title: By FAR the BEST toaster I have ever used in my 65 years ...
customer_reviews.text: By FAR the BEST toaster I have ever used in my 65 years on earth! I love the fancy way it automatically pulls down the toast. Every piece I make is PERFECTLY browned! LOVE LOVE LOVE the extra time button. I guess those who wrote bad reviews got a bad one. I got a perfect one! LOVE THE RED! LOVE THE TOASTER! LOVE THE TOAST! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Mel King

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: One side isn't working already and huge hassle to repair. Too much money for this problem. Toast is great but not exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Love this Toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Toaster! It not only toasts the outside but the whole piece of bread, both sides, top and bottom. It goes down automatically when you put the bread in, then the keep it warm comes on if you leave it for a few minutes once it's done. It goes down again and keeps it warm without burning it. I'm really picky with toasters, but this ones got my vote!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Monson

customer_reviews.title: Not a year hold. Used only during weekend and ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a year hold. Used only during weekend and holidays and it does not toast anymore... Surprising for that brand!
customer_reviews.author: carole guyamier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's beautiful and you get your toast exactly as you wish
customer_reviews.author: jo ann vassallo

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! and the extra features like "keep warm" and "a little longer" are nice. The only negative is that I like my toast very dark and it takes at least two times to toast it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Best Toaster Ever
customer_reviews.text: Not made of cheap material, toasts evenly. Worth every penny I spent. We use it every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Horowitz

customer_reviews.title: It’s expensive but I love my toaster..
customer_reviews.text: I loved my product my toast got perfect brown, you just drop your toast in and the rest is up to the toaster 🤗
customer_reviews.author: knight

customer_reviews.title: MMMM...makes toast!
customer_reviews.text: SO WHAT!...if every review says it's too much for a toaster. My kitchen aid pro products will outlast any and all nuclear attacks...at least I can make toast and glow at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster
customer_reviews.text: package came on time , and work wonderful, The best toaster .
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: A toaster that doesn't toast?!
customer_reviews.text: Thicker slices of bread put into this machine on the darkest setting come out without even a hint of brown coloring. Thats bad enough, but then when run through a second time, there was still barely any toasty color. $400+ for a toaster that doesn't toast!! Thin slices of bread do toast properly on the higher settings. Is there a way to tinker with the toasting times/thermostat?
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster! With 3 kids and busy breakfast times the keep warm option is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool R2D2
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding! After a couple months we are very happy. Pricy- but delivers what it is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: stuffthatworks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exceeds expectations, well priced for the quality and performance of this toaster
customer_reviews.author: Bl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome unit
customer_reviews.text: Toast comes out just right has many settings to control lightness. Believe it or not it becomes a conversation piece
customer_reviews.author: Judith Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: First time customer and well pleased with the product and speed of delivery.Look forward to future orders.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: So worth the money. This toaster works as well as any toaster made by a human could work. Looks good in the kitchen as well.
customer_reviews.author: Howard A. Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Toasting on the other hand👎
customer_reviews.text: I originally put up a glowing review but after about a week of use it is having troubles. Let state the obvious, it looks amazing. But get real it is a TOASTER and should toast. This thing will not toast evenly for nothin. I wish this was not the case due to how great it looks with our other KA appliances. I will give it a few more attempts but I’m 90% sure I am sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware of company selling - BIGFISH OR BIGKITCHEN
customer_reviews.text: My complaint is more with the company (BigFish/BigKitchen) who sold this $300 toaster. This thing didn't even turn on... is there no one checking these things? Or they just hope people keep their crap? This is such a SCAM!!! In my previous experience Kitchenaid stuff is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: This Toaster is perfect, it toast everything perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This Toaster is perfect,it toast everything perfectly. I don't know why some customers are stating this toaster toasts bread etc unevenly or it's too slow, I have not experienced that at all; this toaster is efficient and toast bread,bagels and frozen waffles perfectly,I love the keep warm feature,I Would definitely recommend purchasing this Toaster,it's a little expensive,but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Spooky

customer_reviews.title: This product is defective
customer_reviews.text: The Kitchenaid toaster is beautiful and when it worked it was quite nice. The problem is that it worked for three months and then promptly died. This means no one is willing to take responsibility for the defective product, not Amazon (30 days is the max) and not Kitchenaid. Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Very cool conversation piece for the countertop
customer_reviews.text: Way more than you need in a 4 slice toaster, but if you want people to be impressed at your counter put one of these babies up there.
customer_reviews.author: azviewer39586

customer_reviews.title: You're paying for the name and color, not the quality
customer_reviews.text: Great idea; but the stupid thing doesn't toast well. You have to set it at full blast, and still it doesn't toast well some times. It looks like a million bucks and toasts like a $10 toaster
customer_reviews.author: David Fenton

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and toasts perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Expensive product, but worth every penny. Easy to use and toasts perfectly. Many advanced features make this a great toaster. It does take up a lot of counter space; if you are short on counter space, you might want to consider a different toaster.
customer_reviews.author: lindarabbit

customer_reviews.title: I Love my new toaster!
customer_reviews.text: I Love my new toaster! In the past I have always put my toasters in our pantry, but this toaster...it stays out on my counter! It toasts perfectly. It is pricey but when I count the money I have spent on previous toasters only to throw them away after a year or two, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer P.

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster
customer_reviews.text: This toaster toasts as good as any toaster we have ever had. Every function works as well. I am not sure about other reviews that complain about the loud chime. The chime on this unit is very pleasant and a good level of sound. You can barely here it unless you are in the kitchen with the toaster. The slots are plenty wide for bagels.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: A delight to own and oprate
customer_reviews.text: You will enjoy its marvelous operation. It makes the best toast. My highest reccomendation. It is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL COOPER

customer_reviews.title: Best Toast Ever
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this toaster. Seriously the absolute best toast I have ever had. It is sleek. Operates like a dream. And toasts everything evenly and perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: R. Chinery

customer_reviews.title: Ferrari of Toaster world!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is costly, but if you like nice things, look no further. Makes the morning breakfast fun, and kids just have so much fun with it. I would definitely recommend to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald S.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this toaster. Pretty to look at on the counter. I enjoy the "Little longer" function. Cooks well. Once you put anything into, it automatically sets its down. The only down fall to that is of your not ready to toast.
customer_reviews.author: Jill S.

customer_reviews.title: Cadillac of Toasters!!
customer_reviews.text: Now this is the Cadillac of toasters. Works so smooth, easy to set and has a pleasant sound when the toast is done. I like the feature where it goes back down for a while to keep it warm if you can't get to it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Intense

customer_reviews.title: Almost got a 5
customer_reviews.text: I like this toaster for a few practical reasons, in spite of its apparent impracticality. 1. The automatic toasting ALSO means automatically popping up; I've put thick rolls, bagels, and slices of Italian bread in there, and never had anything stuck! 2. A lot of settings. At first, it seemed too much. Then I found there was really a nice range of toasting compared to the settings on a cheap toaster. 3. The FROZEN setting is pretty intuitive. The drawback: when your toast is ready, it comes up on the motorized cradle. If you don't retrieve it fast enough, like if you're busy cooking, it retracts and toasts it again! If not for this, 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R

customer_reviews.title: High quality and worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The performance justifies the realitive high cost. If you like the best performance this is it. Looks great on your counter as well ... kind of the same as displaying your mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Buster

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love my new toaster. Thank you dear Seller for fast delivery and an awesome and beautiful toaster!
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fit and finish, granted we only use it sparingly but we always get compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: BulldogzRUs

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but great!
customer_reviews.text: If you don't mind the price tag, this is a great toaster.
customer_reviews.author: GreattobuyatAmazon53

customer_reviews.title: It is amazingly accurate and sturdy for a large family
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's anniversary. It is amazingly accurate and sturdy for a large family.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster except the printing or settings for use is ...
customer_reviews.text: Great toaster except the printing or settings for use is in white ink on light gray body on the toaster . Very, very hard to see and read . Poor design . Maybe on red or white this is not a problem. Needed gray to match kitchen, But? You get perfect toast every time .
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toast
customer_reviews.text: We bought our first one and then two more for the families. The toast is perfect. It gives a great excuse to eat toast, as if one is needed. We love the keep warm feature.
customer_reviews.author: EJC

customer_reviews.title: OMG This toaster is so AWESOME! Put the bread in and it automatically pops ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG This toaster is so AWESOME! Put the bread in and it automatically pops down and when it is done it beeps and the toast pops up. If it is toasted but you want it a little darker just hit the "A little longer" button. If you don't take the toast out within 45 seconds it pops back down and keeps warm up to 3 minutes. Love that it has the crumb trays to make clean up a breeze. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY- Kitchenaid conquered the toaster battle
customer_reviews.text: we finally broke down and bought this toaster because we were so SICK of multiple toasters that didn't toast correctly. We absolutely love it; we would love it even if it weren't candy apple red but that makes it even better. WORTH EVERY PENNY and we don't normally spend our money casually
customer_reviews.author: cdmofwa

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this one again.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome toaster, very well made (as it should be for the price). 2 complaints, one minor, when you put bread or a bagel in it it dings, which sounds similar to our door bell, which sets my dogs barking, not good at 5:30 in the morning, and I can't figure how to turn of the dinger. The other complaint, I like my toast dark and if I am toasting a moist whole grain bread, even the darkest setting isn't enough. Otherwise it's great, I especially like the keep warm feature, and the ability to toast 2 different breads at different settings at the same time. Over all a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: BikerLance

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's magic and it works oh so well! I hope it lasts forever!
customer_reviews.author: Gallia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Toast
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this toaster in black, it IS the 4 slice toaster. Toasting does take longer (about 175%) than a $40 dollar toaster, BUT the result is extremely consistant and even. Remember to adjust for bread type and thickness. Our seven year old is now in charge of toast with perfect and proud results. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: The best and most technologically advanced toaster ever available in the ...
customer_reviews.text: The best and most technologically advanced toaster ever available in the USA. If price is no object, then get this one! This is the best, period. Kitchen Aid has really stepped it up in the last couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gage

customer_reviews.title: Finally, the toaster of my dreams...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in short order and was as expected. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: DiRocco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This toaster rocks! You definetly get what you pay for. ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️👍👍👍😁😁😁😁
customer_reviews.author: Kim

product_meta.title: KitchenAid RKMT4203CA 4-Slice Pro Line Toaster, Candy Apple Red
product_meta.description: Color:Red 4-sliceFeaturing a host of user-friendly features and a slick, modern design based on KitchenAid’s signature stand mixer, the Pro Line Toaster is one of the most advanced toasters we’ve ever used. With an automated feeding function, Auto Keep Warm feature, seven shade settings and four toasting functions, toasting with the Pro Line Toaster is quick and effortless. Four-slice capacity. Manufacturer: KitchenAid. Material: Aluminum, chrome. Care: Hand wipe clean. Dimensions: 13¾" x 12" x 8". Capacity: 4 slices. Warranty: 5-year replacement warranty. Made in China. FEATURESAutomated feeding function lowers a slice of bread as soon as it is placed in a slot and raises it when it has reached the desired shade. Auto Keep Warm function automatically warms toast by returning it to the toaster if it has not been removed within 45 seconds—great for those busy mornings. Four toasting functions include Bagel, Frozen, A Little Longer and Toast/Cancel. Seven shade settings for the perfect toast every time.
feature_bullets: Featuring a host of user-friendly features and a slick, modern design based on KitchenAid’s signature stand mixer, the Pro Line Toaster is one of the most advanced toasters we’ve ever used
With an automated feeding function, Auto Keep Warm feature, seven shade settings and four toasting functions, toasting with the Pro Line Toaster is quick and effortless

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars125 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
